name: Ready Cassette Go!
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2020 BABY!

I was happy to sink 70+ hours into this game and hopefully the spritework and level design shows! There were some bugs that I was unable to squash in time, namely 2, these being:

1) Player will hang on standard ground block for no reason (these can be jumped)

2) issues on Stage 1-4 with speaker enemy not resetting position correctly.

I hope you enjoy and I would love to hear genuine feedback (good and bad!) as if I ain't earning, I better be learning.

James,

Hot Glue Games
